TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryTranslationPreprocessor extends System.Object

summary.para: A class that preprocesses the query before translation.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions and How EF Core queries work for more information and examples.

abstract member NormalizeQueryableMethod : System.Linq.Expressions.Expression -> System.Linq.Expressions.Expression override this.NormalizeQueryableMethod : System.Linq.Expressions.Expression -> System.Linq.Expressions.Expression

Docs.summary: Normalizes queryable methods in the query.
Docs.returns: A query expression after normalization has been done.
Docs.remarks: This method extracts query metadata information like tracking, ignore query filters. It also converts potential enumerable methods on navigation to queryable methods. It flattens patterns of GroupJoin-SelectMany patterns to appropriate Join/LeftJoin.
